title: How to Clone Pokémon on Pokémon Gold and Silver

steps.title: Move the Pokémon in your PC around, so that you have at least 2 empty boxes.
steps.content: Move the Pokémon in your PC around, so that you have at least 2 empty boxes.

steps.title: Move the Pokémon you want to duplicate into your party.
steps.content: Move the Pokémon you want to duplicate into your party.

steps.title: Equip the Pokémon with valuable items that you might want to copy (e.g.
steps.content: Equip the Pokémon with valuable items that you might want to copy (e.g. Master Ball, Rare Candy, Nugget, etc.).

steps.title: Switch to an empty box in your PC.
steps.content: Switch to an empty box in your PC. When the game asks you if you want to save, select "yes".

steps.title: Deposit the Pokémon you want to duplicate into the empty box of your PC.
steps.content: Deposit the Pokémon you want to duplicate into the empty box of your PC.

steps.title: Now, switch to another empty box in your PC.
steps.content: Now, switch to another empty box in your PC. CAUTION: when it says do you want to save, select "yes", but keep an eye on the message at the bottom.

steps.title: Text will flash across the bottom, saying "Saving, don't turn off the power."
steps.content: Text will flash across the bottom, saying "Saving, don't turn off the power." Right when the whole word "power" shows up on the screen, turn off the power immediately.

steps.title: Turn on the power.
steps.content: Turn on the power. Check your party and your PC box. If it worked, you should have the Pokémon in both your party and your PC box.
